name: imaver
author: Unknown
description: Computes the mean and standard deviation, pixel-by-pixel, of a whole bunch of images.

inputs.description: Output average image file. Use '-' to skip output.
inputs.name: Output Average Image

inputs.description: Output standard deviation image file. Use '-' to skip output.
inputs.name: Output Standard Deviation Image

output-files.description: Output image file for standard deviations (optional)
output-files.name: Output Standard Deviation Image File
